item.title: How to build a Supercomputer
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: So you want to build a supercomputer? Well, if you checked out my video on quantum computing you’ll know that scientist are working to make computers stronger and faster than ever. Unfortunately, building a quantum computer is not something you can do at home, unless your home is a laboratory of course. All hope isn’t lost though, you can still go on to build your very own supercomputer.Â To do this, we will be making a Linux cluster.
